synopsis.text: Tsutomu's mundane life as a high school student takes a dramatic turn when he stumbles upon an intergalactic showdown between the ruthless space criminal Geega and the formidable Federation investigator Birdy. Unbeknownst to Tsutomu, Geega has disguised himself within the glamorous entertainment industry on Earth, with Birdy following suit as the rising model, Arita Shion. Caught in the crossfire, Tsutomu pays the ultimate price as he is used as a shield by Geega, only to be saved by Birdy's intervention. However, his salvation comes at a cost, as his body and life are now forever intertwined with Birdy's. As Tsutomu grapples with his new reality, he must learn to coexist with Birdy, balancing the challenges of high school, her modeling career, and her perilous pursuit of intergalactic justice.
